009package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
010
011/**
012 * This interface specifies methods for retrieving XYZ coordinates of white
013 * point and RGB primaries from the implementing color space.
014 * 
015 * @author WB
016 * @version 2022/11/15
017 */
018public interface RgbReferenceData {
019        
020//      public float[] toCIEXYZ(float[] value);
021//      public float[] fromCIEXYZ(float[] value);
022//      public float[] toRGB(float[] value);
023//      public float[] fromRGB(float[] value);
024        
025        /**
026         * Returns the XYZ coordinates of the white point
027         * associated with this color space (typically D65 or D50).
028         * 
029         * @return the white point
030         */
031        public float[] getWhitePoint();
032        
033        /**
034         * Returns the XYZ color coordinates for the primary color with the specified
035         * index, measured relative to the white point of this color space (see
036         * {@link #getWhitePoint()}).
037         * 
038         * @param idx the color index (R = 0, G = 1, B = 2)
039         * @return the XYZ coordinate for the primary color
040         */
041        public float[] getPrimary(int idx) ;
042        
043}
